An appendix to the third part of The friendly debate being a letter of the conformist to the non-conformist : together with a postscript / by the same author. Friendly debate between a conformist and a non-conformist. Part 3, Appendix Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.
[16], 213, [2] p.
Printed for H. Eversden ..., London : 1670.
Advertisement: p. [1]-[2] at end. Includes bibliographical references. Errata: prelim. p. [16]. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
